verbs.description: [ARG0: The Fox News host] [V: says] [ARG1: Trump ’s Twitter attacks are like “ using a bazooka to respond to a pea shooter] . ”
The Fox News host says [ARG1: Trump ’s Twitter attacks] [V: are] [ARG2: like “ using a bazooka to respond to a pea shooter] . ”
The Fox News host says Trump ’s Twitter attacks are like “ [V: using] [ARG1: a bazooka] [ARG2: to respond to a pea shooter] . ”
The Fox News host says Trump ’s Twitter attacks are like “ using a bazooka to [V: respond] [ARG1: to a pea shooter] . ”
